content:
hl7-fhircast-bot opened Issue #109

## May 2019 Ballot Comment: Provide example topics to support drug and medical device research.

Submitted by Mitra Rocca; Terrie Reed
Chapter/section:
Url: https://fhircast.hl7.org/#event-catalog
Type: A-S

Summary: Provide example topics to support drug and medical device research.

Comment: It wold be useful to create example hub topics to support events based on safety for outcome research related to the use registries. For instance if a medication or device is selected in the "driving app" (e.g. an EHR) the registry/"synchronized app" could show associated safety or recall events associated with the selected "Medication" or "Device".

_This issue was imported by @hl7-fhircast-bot from the consolidated FHIRcast May 2019 ballot spreadsheet._

hl7-fhircast-bot labeled Issue #109

## May 2019 Ballot Comment: Provide example topics to support drug and medical device research.

Submitted by Mitra Rocca; Terrie Reed
Chapter/section:
Url: https://fhircast.hl7.org/#event-catalog
Type: A-S

Summary: Provide example topics to support drug and medical device research.

Comment: It wold be useful to create example hub topics to support events based on safety for outcome research related to the use registries. For instance if a medication or device is selected in the "driving app" (e.g. an EHR) the registry/"synchronized app" could show associated safety or recall events associated with the selected "Medication" or "Device".

_This issue was imported by @hl7-fhircast-bot from the consolidated FHIRcast May 2019 ballot spreadsheet._

isaacvetter commented on Issue #109:

In discussion with @wmaethner , @NiklasSvenzen , @lbergnehr we talked through this issue. As part of this ballot, we'll be modifying the syntax of events as well as creating a process for the definition of events. Events based upon specific use-cases, such as device recall checking could be enabled through this mechanism.

Proposed Resolution: Persuasive with Mod
Proposed Resolution comment: Although we're not creating specific events for Terrie's defined use-cases, we are enabling multiple use-cases.

isaacvetter labeled Issue #109:

Comment: It wold be useful to create example hub topics to support events based on safety for outcome research related to the use registries. For instance if a medication or device is selected in the "driving app" (e.g. an EHR) the registry/"synchronized app" could show associated safety or recall events associated with the selected "Medication" or "Device".

_This issue was imported by @hl7-fhircast-bot from the consolidated FHIRcast May 2019 ballot spreadsheet._

isaacvetter commented on Issue #109:

Proposed Resolution: Persuasive with Mod
Proposed Resolution comment: Although we're not creating specific events for Terrie's defined use-cases, we are creating a FHIR resource based computable event syntax in #108.

isaacvetter commented on Issue #109:

## :telephone_receiver: II Working Group Vote (5-30-2019)

Meeting notes: https://confluence.hl7.org/display/IMIN/Teleconferences

@gkustas moved the following disposition, seconded by Chris Lindop

Disposition: Persuasive with Mod
Disposition Comment:Although we're not creating specific events for Terrie's defined use-cases, we are creating a FHIR resource based computable event syntax in #108.

:+1: For: 13
:expressionless: Abstain: 0
:-1: Against: 0

:tada: The motion passed! :tada:
